alert.note: Alert for Blount; Cocke; Jefferson; Sevier (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 4:17PM CST until February 27 at 4:45PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EST FOR CENTRAL BLOUNT...SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHWESTERN COCKE AND SEVIER COUNTIES... At 515 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pigeon Forge, or 7 miles southeast of Sevierville, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Newport, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Parrottsville, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center and Townsend. This includes Interstate 40 in Tennessee between mile markers 430 and 451. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
